blademaster:AncestralHealing.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your Charges. Gain !M! HP per Charge removed. NL Exhaust.
blademaster:AncestralHealing.NAME: Ancestral Healing

blademaster:AwakeningDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Awaken !M! of your Blades.
blademaster:AwakeningDefend.NAME: Awakening Defend

blademaster:AwakeningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Awaken !M! of your Blades.
blademaster:AwakeningStrike.NAME: Awakening Strike

blademaster:BasicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Change your Stance to Basic Stance.
blademaster:BasicAttack.NAME: Basic Attack

blademaster:BladeDance.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Consumes 30 Fury and 6 Combo. NL Your Havoc Blades deal double damage.
blademaster:BladeDance.NAME: Blade Dance

blademaster:BladeMastery.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Havoc Blade. NL Innate. NL Exhaust.
blademaster:BladeMastery.NAME: Blade Mastery

blademaster:Blockade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your Havoc Blades attack, gain !M! Block.
blademaster:Blockade.NAME: Blockade

blademaster:BloodyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Bloodied: Apply !M! Bleeding.
blademaster:BloodyBlow.NAME: Bloody Blow

blademaster:BrainBloom.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus until the end of your turn.
blademaster:BrainBloom.NAME: Brain Bloom

blademaster:Breeze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.
blademaster:Breeze.NAME: Breeze

blademaster:Burnout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to 2 Burns.
blademaster:Burnout.NAME: Burnout

blademaster:ChargingUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you're in a Stance, gain !M! Charges.
blademaster:ChargingUp.NAME: Charging Up

blademaster:CloudOfSteel.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Lacerate to your hand for each Blade channeled.
blademaster:CloudOfSteel.NAME: Cloud of Steel

blademaster:ElementalDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires !M! Fury. Deal damage equal the sum of ALL your Charges to ALL enemies. Double your Charges.
blademaster:ElementalDestruction.NAME: Elemental Destruction

blademaster:Empower.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . Draw 1 card. NL If you're in a stance, gain !M! Charges.
blademaster:Empower.NAME: Empower
blademaster:Empower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . Draw 2 cards. NL If you're in a stance, gain !M! Charges.

blademaster:EyeOfTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: Only playable in Lightning Stance. NL Whenever you're attacked, reduce the damage by 1 and gain 1 Lightning Charge.
blademaster:EyeOfTheStorm.NAME: Eye of the Storm

blademaster:FallBack.DESCRIPTION: Evoke ALL of your Blades. Gain !B! Block for each Blade evoked.
blademaster:FallBack.NAME: Fall Back

blademaster:FinishHim.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 random Finisher to your hand.
blademaster:FinishHim.NAME: Finish Him!
blademaster:FinishHim.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random Finishers to your hand.

blademaster:FlockOfBlades.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Consumes 30 Fury and 6 Combo. NL Channel !M! Havoc Blades.
blademaster:FlockOfBlades.NAME: Flock Of Blades

blademaster:Freeze.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of Ice Charges and apply !M! Frozen to ALL enemies.
blademaster:Freeze.NAME: Freeze

blademaster:Gale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add a Zephyr to your hand. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
blademaster:Gale.NAME: Gale

blademaster:Hailwind.DESCRIPTION: Only playable in Wind Stance. NL Deal !D! damage for every Wind Charge you have.
blademaster:Hailwind.NAME: Hailwind

blademaster:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Burn, take !M! damage, deal twice as much to ALL enemies, and discard it.
blademaster:Inferno.NAME: Inferno

blademaster:Insult.DESCRIPTION: Show your mental stability by insulting something. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
blademaster:Insult.NAME: Insult
blademaster:Insult.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Still doesn't do jack shit. NL Nice try though. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

blademaster:IntellectualSupremacy.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Insults to your hand. NL Exhaust.
blademaster:IntellectualSupremacy.NAME: Intellectual Supremacy

blademaster:LightningCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Change your Stance to Lightning Stance.
blademaster:LightningCrash.NAME: Lightning Crash

blademaster:LightningDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Change your Stance to Lightning Stance.
blademaster:LightningDash.NAME: Lightning Dash

blademaster:LightningDraw.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 4 Combo. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Bleeding to ALL enemies. NL Change your Stance to Lightning Stance.
blademaster:LightningDraw.NAME: Lightning Draw

blademaster:Meditate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you channel a Blade, heal !M! HP.
blademaster:Meditate.NAME: Meditate

blademaster:RagingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Costs 15 Fury. NL Deal !D! damage. Bloodied: Deals double damage.
blademaster:RagingBlow.NAME: Raging Blow

blademaster:Recklessness.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable and Channel 1 Havoc Blade.
blademaster:Recklessness.NAME: Recklessness

blademaster:Retreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Change your Stance to Basic Stance.
blademaster:Retreat.NAME: Retreat

blademaster:RollingTyphoon.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 30 Fury to activate. NL Deal !M! damage. Deal !D! damage to all enemies.
blademaster:RollingTyphoon.NAME: Rolling Typhoon

blademaster:Safeguard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Channel 1 Havoc Blade.
blademaster:Safeguard.NAME: Safeguard

blademaster:SecondWind.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Costs 3 Combo. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Change your Stance to Wind Stance.
blademaster:SecondWind.NAME: Second Wind

blademaster:SharpBlades.DESCRIPTION: Your Havoc Blades apply 1 Bleeding on hit.
blademaster:SharpBlades.NAME: Sharp Blades

blademaster:StanceMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a Charge, gain an additional Charge.
blademaster:StanceMastery.NAME: Stance Mastery

blademaster:Stormstrike.DESCRIPTION: Only playable in Lightning Stance. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times the amount of Lightning Charges.
blademaster:Stormstrike.NAME: Stormstrike

blademaster:Surge.DESCRIPTION: Only usable while in Lightning or Wind Stance. NL Consume up to 3 Charges and gain Artifact equal to the amount consumed.
blademaster:Surge.NAME: Surge

blademaster:WindSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Change your Stance to Wind Stance.
blademaster:WindSlash.NAME: Wind Slash

blademaster:Windstorm.DESCRIPTION: Only playable in Wind Stance. NL At the start of your turn, add 2 Wind Lacerates to your hand.
blademaster:Windstorm.NAME: Windstorm

blademaster:Wall.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 5 Combo. NL Gain !M! Metallicize.
blademaster:Wall.NAME: Wall

blademaster:Zephyr.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
blademaster:Zephyr.NAME: Zephyr
